args.sql_create_table: create table if not exists raw_r711_data (batt float4, temp float4, humid float4)
args.sql_insert_table: insert into raw_r711_data (batt, temp, humid) values (%(batt)s, %(temp)s, %(humid)s)

args.sql_create_table: create table if not exists raw_xs770a_data (accel float4, velocity float4, temp float4, ts timestamptz, deveui text, rssi float4, snr float4)
args.sql_insert_table: insert into raw_xs770a_data (accel, velocity, temp, ts, deveui, rssi, snr) values (%(accel)s, %(velocity)s, %(temp)s, %(ts)s, %(deveui)s, %(rssi)s, %(snr)s)

args.sql_create_table: create table if not exists xs770a_data ( ts timestamptz, deveui text, rssi float4, snr float4, accel float4, velocity float4, temp float4)
args.sql_insert_table: insert into xs770a_data ( ts, deveui, rssi, snr, accel, velocity, temp) values ( %(ts)s, %(deveui)s, %(rssi)s, %(snr)s, %(accel)s, %(velocity)s, %(temp)s )
